content:
The Hilton Garden Inn Times Square Central is a fantastic choice, especially with the free breakfast buffet. It's a great value considering the location and amenities.

Hilton Garden Inn is a reliable brand, and it's wonderful that you've had good experiences with them in the past. They're known for their comfortable rooms, friendly staff, and excellent amenities.

The location of the Hilton Garden Inn Times Square Central is really convenient, too. You'll be just a block away from Times Square, and within walking distance to many popular attractions, restaurants, and shops.

The free breakfast buffet is definitely a highlight, but don't forget to also take advantage of the hotel's other amenities, such as the fitness center, business center, and on-site convenience store.

If you have any more questions or need help with booking, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope you have a fantastic stay at the Hilton Garden Inn Times Square Central and enjoy your time in New York City!
